ygData.subject: RE: Feign Death vs. casters and anomolous failures
ygData.msgSnippet: unfortunately, yes, this is supposed to happen. Supposedly there is a radius of aggression which, once the critter has passed it, it will not return, but I
ygData.messageBody:
unfortunately, yes, this is supposed to happen. Supposedly there is a radius
of aggression which, once the critter has passed it, it will not return, but
I have never had a monster forget about me. The funniest was running from a
brigand in the Karanas (West I think it was). I FD (was on a corpse
retreival run and in no mood to fight this thing), wait, run, FD, wait,
run... repeat all the way to North Karanas Zone. I was laughing so hard I
cant believe the dumb brigand didn't know I was alive! =D

Praelor

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ronnie [SMTP:ronnien@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 2:28 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Feign Death vs. casters and anomolous
> failures
>
> From: "Ronnie" <ronnien@...>
>
> : tells a quick story of woe
>
> Once uopn a time there was a Monk who was going to Freepoet after getting
> her red headband in Qeynos she was all the way to the west Commans when
> she
> happened upon a hill Giant who decided to step on her. She feigned death
> the Giant thinking he had killed our heroine walk off and started crushing
> people in derv camp which was was pretty far away she could barely see it
> in the distance. Rather hurt the Monk stood and mended her wounds. The
> Giant who was no were near her can RUNNING BACK and procceded to kill her.
> She rewake in Qeynos were she was bound and started the long run back to
> the
> commans and her body woundering why the Hill Giant came running back just
> for her.
>
> The end.
>
> : Adds a quick almost tale of Woe
>
> Later while she was in East Karana she was jumped by a goruge hound she
> ran
> to the gaurds already hurt and bleeding from a fight with a Gnoll, seeing
> the gurads of the fishing village (though they were trying there best to
> kill it) would not be able to before it killed her in time she feigned
> death. The hound looked at her for a moment and walked off she opened an
> eye and looked around for a few minutes to make sure it was NO WERE in
> sight
> before standing up she even had time to sit down to try to heal when all
> of
> a sudden IT CAME RUNNING BACK! Luckally the gurads were able to slay the
> thing in time (lived by 23 hps).
>
> The end (for real this time)
>
> So heres the question: ummmm is this whats soposed to happen?
>
> Palerose 19th circle Monk of the Ashen order who thinks its about time she
> looked in to buying more mesh armor.
>
>
>
